correct.  While it has limited scope, I would still like to ensure someone is logged in.

flow is this:

HubSpot deal > ui-extension > openIframeModal > NextJS app (hosted on netlify) > app experience > Api calls to create records in HubSpot > close modal/iframe > back to deal

Because the NextJS app is public, and if I use the private app api key, any action there can be done by anyone, technically (my only security is through people not knowing the URL).

I've tried putting oAuth in as the iframe loads -- but long story short -- becomes an issue with the iframe, redirects, and getting back to the intended path to load.

Open to suggestions.
(in the past, with sfdc, I've done this by passing the session to the app and continuing the session, was hoping for something similar here)
